<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tempest-Sun Shielding](/Feats.aspx?ID=1113) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Magaambyan Attendant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=29)

**Prerequisites**
[Tempest-Sun Redirection](/Feats.aspx?ID=1108)

**Trigger**
You or an ally within 30 feet takes damage.

</column>

---

You transform unrealized spell energy into a protective shield. If you’re a spontaneous spellcaster, expend a spell slot; if you’re a prepared spellcaster, expend a spell prepared in a spell slot. Reduce the triggering damage by an amount equal to four times the level of the expended slot or spell.
name: Tempest-Sun Shielding
